mapper.update: update paimai_live_rooms set views=views+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select lr.*, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_offers go where go.room_id=lr.id) as offer_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods_deposits gd where gd.room_id=lr.id and gd.status > 0) as deposit_count, (select count(*) from paimai_goods g where g.room_id=lr.id) as goods_count from paimai_live_rooms lr where id = #{id}
